name: Hidden Objects Enchanted Forest Fantasy Kids Game (iPad Edition)
name_original: Hidden Objects Enchanted Forest Fantasy Kids Game (iPad Edition)
description:
Introducing the Hidden Objects Enchanted Forest Fantasy Kids Game that places you in this magical story.

This Hidden Objects Kids App is so Different and Unique.. Its like none you have played before.

From 4 to 80 everyone will love to explore the Enchanted Forest and discover the hidden objects.

With 6 Beautiful Hand Crafted Levels with Hidden Objects, Hidden Pictures for you to discover which allow you to Unlock 6 fun and challenging Achievements.

*6 Beautifully Crafted Enchanted Levels
*6 Achievements to Unlock
*Enchanted Leader Board
*100+ Hidden Objects to Find
*Fun for all Ages
*Free Updates

This Hidden Objects Enchanted Forest Fantasy Kids Game is a Timer based game that will provide the perfect personal challenge for you or your children as well as others as you try to Achieve the best score and lead the Enchanted Leader Board.

Works great to improve children's motor skills, problem solving and memorization.

This Hidden Objects Enchanted Forest Fantasy Kids Game makes a great gift app for the special people in your life.

Hurry before price goes up!!
